title: The Fisherman and his wife
creator_credit: Gisela Frisen, Per Ekholm and Minimal Produkten
brief_description: This is the tale of a poor fisherman who catches an enchanted fish. His wife demands that he ask the fish to grant him a wish but the fish teaches the ambitious wife a lesson about wishing for too much. Puppets in silhouette are used to translate this Brothers Grimm fairytale.
creator_credit_for_label: Gisela Frisen, Per Ekholm and Minimal Produkten

description_for_label: This is the tale of a poor fisherman who catches an enchanted fish. His wife demands that he ask the fish to grant him a wish but the fish teaches the ambitious wife a lesson about wishing for too much. Puppets in silhouette are used to translate this Brothers Grimm fairytale.
